title: Love Paradise
lyrics: You're always on my mind All day just all the time You're everything to me Brightest star to let me see You touch me in my dreams We kiss in every scene I pray to be with you through rain and shiny days I'll love you till I die Deep as sea / Wide as sky The beauty of our love paints rainbows everywhere we go I need you all my life You're my hope / You're my pride In your arms I find my heaven In your eyes my sea and sky May life our love para dise
